title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Stateroom One", ca. 1934–35
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: Floor Plan of Stateroom " 1/SHOWING SCHEME WITH 2 ENTRANCES./SCHEME B.; instructions in graphite.
description: Plan and elevations for stateroom 1 of Lady Esther Yacht. Three-seat sofa along center of north wall flanked by shelves. Desk and sidechair to right of sofa on east wall. Tub chair in lower right corner of upper portion of room; drawers and chair on upper west wall. Two single beds in lower left corner of room, facing east; drawers along south wall and upper right corner of room. Bathroom and closet to right of beds on east wall. Tub, toilet, and sink in upper part of room; drawers for lingerie and closet in lower part of room.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Stateroom One", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-430.
